fields.label: Is this a 'Metro' or 'Sylvan' property?
fields.name: metro_sylvan
fields.instructions: This is very important choice to make initially.  Specific design elements are only available for each brand, meaning some choices will not be available between the two brands.

fields.label: Get Coordinates
fields.message: To get the latitude and longitude, you can use this tool.

fields.label: Schema Description
fields.name: schema_description
fields.instructions: This is used for structured data.  It is used for SEO purposes, and not displayed anywhere on the site.

fields.label: Google Places Map Link
fields.name: google_places_map_link
fields.instructions: This is used for structured data.  It is used for SEO purposes, and not displayed anywhere on the site.

fields.label: Schedule Specials
fields.name: schedule_specials
fields.instructions: If activated, the schedule overrides the default On/Off activation switch.

fields.label: Instagram User
fields.name: instagram_user
fields.instructions: This is the Instagram User. Use "self" if your app is not approved.

fields.label: Pattern Density
fields.name: pattern_density
fields.instructions: This will determine how often the pattern is used.  The use is predetermined depending on density selection.

fields.label: Pattern Opacity
fields.name: opacity
fields.instructions: Use the slider to change the opacity of the pattern.
